select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderdate ,count(distinct(orderno)) as ordercnt
from ordertbl
where '${sales_from}' <= to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= '${sales_to}'
group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by orderdate desc

select o.orderno, s.suborderno, m.userid, m.username, s.subprice from ordertbl o join suborder s on o.orderno=s.orderno join member m on o.userid=m.userid where to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{param1}

select * from (select * from (select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderdate, to_char(count(distinct(o.orderno)), '999,999,999') as ordercnt, sum(subprice) as totalsales, sum(deliveryprice) as totaldelivery from ordertbl o join suborder s on o.orderno=s.orderno
where '${sales_from}' <= to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= '${sales_to}'
group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by orderdate desc) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{onePageRecord} order by orderdate asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord} #{onePageRecord} order by orderdate desc
